trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Wildwood
There were no other sightings in Wildwood on or around July 4th 1980
Summary: Hovering blimp shape with multi-colored lights around edges
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in Wildwood Nj over the Fourth of July weekend 1980 OR 1981 - I think the sighting was in 1981. I was waiting for everyone to get ready to go out, I was on the front porch of a rented house, looked up the street and saw this gigantic blimp shaped object hovering just over the electric lines. It was around dusk, not night-time. The object had multi-colored lights outlining it, I can't remember if they were on all the time, or blinking. It was partially obscured by buildings, and was between our house and the beach, about a block and a half from the beach. I swear I watched this thing for a good 20 minutes, no one else saw it. It just sat there in the sky. I had no feelings of "Oh wow,I have to tell someone about this!", and in hindsight, I'm surprised I had no reaction to seeing this thing.And NO, it was not a blimp, or a plane, or planes, it was unidentified. I went back inside at some point - the weird thing is, I forgot all about this event until years later, maybe 10 years later. Totally forgot it. Makes it even more bizarre. Now I've done a little research and I believe that it is the same UFO referred to as the Hudson Valley UfO. I've seen a photo of that one that is pretty identical to the object I saw.
